item.title: KB HOME 10-K
item.description: KB HOME, which is in the Operative Builders [1531] industry, SEC 10-K filing on January 20, 2023 had 42257 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2022 - 528 instances land - 426 instances 2021 - 323 instances million - 307 instances 30 - 296 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
